entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse What land do you live on 21 states have a spike in covid-19 these people that stayed home or now out to work or getting sick schools only allowing children one day a week parents are going to be out of a job to teach their children at home we need another check fast
